admin_templates.template:
<xen:require js="js/xenforo/tag.js" /> <xen:textboxunit label="{xen:phrase tags}:" name="tinhte_xentag_tags" value="{xen:if '{$Tinhte_XenTag_tags}', {xen:helper implode, ', ', $Tinhte_XenTag_tags.editable}}" inputclass="TagInput" data-extra-class="verticalShift"> <xen:explain>{xen:phrase multiple_tags_may_be_separated_by_commas}</xen:explain> </xen:textboxunit>
<input type="hidden" name="tinhte_xentag_included" value="1" />

<xen:require js="js/xenforo/tag.js" /> <xen:textboxunit label="{xen:phrase tags}:" name="tinhte_xentag_tags" value="{xen:if '{$Tinhte_XenTag_tags}', {xen:helper implode, ', ', $Tinhte_XenTag_tags.editable}}" inputclass="TagInput" data-extra-class="verticalShift"> <xen:explain>{xen:phrase multiple_tags_may_be_separated_by_commas}</xen:explain> </xen:textboxunit>
<input type="hidden" name="tinhte_xentag_included" value="1" />

<xen:textboxunit label="{xen:phrase tag}:" name="criteria[tinhte_xentag_tag]" value="{$criteria.tinhte_xentag_tag}" inputclass="AutoComplete AcSingle" data-acurl="{xen:link misc/tag-auto-complete}" />
<xen:edithint template="helper_thread_search_criteria" />

<xen:textboxunit label="{xen:phrase tinhte_xentag_untag}:" name="actions[tinhte_xentag][remove]" inputclass="AutoComplete" data-acurl="{xen:link misc/tag-auto-complete}" /> <xen:textboxunit label="{xen:phrase tinhte_xentag_new_tags}:" name="actions[tinhte_xentag][add]" inputclass="AutoComplete" data-acurl="{xen:link misc/tag-auto-complete}" /> <xen:textboxunit label="{xen:phrase tinhte_xentag_replace_tags}:" name="actions[tinhte_xentag][replace]" inputclass="AutoComplete" data-acurl="{xen:link misc/tag-auto-complete}" /> <xen:checkboxunit label=""> <xen:option name="actions[tinhte_xentag][remove_all]" value="1">{xen:phrase tinhte_xentag_untag_all}</xen:option> </xen:checkboxunit>
<xen:edithint template="thread_batch_update_confirm" />
{xen:phrase tinhte_xentag_upgrade_from_134}

<xen:checkboxunit label=""> <xen:option name="{$namePrefix}use_search_engine" value="1" selected="{xen:if '{$widget.widget_id} > 0', {$options.use_search_engine}, 1}"> {xen:phrase tinhte_xentag_use_search_engine} </xen:option> <xen:explain>{xen:phrase tinhte_xentag_use_search_engine_explain}</xen:explain> </xen:checkboxunit>
<xen:spinboxunit label="{xen:phrase tinhte_xentag_tags_first_few}:" name="{$namePrefix}tags_first_few" value="{$options.tags_first_few}"> <xen:explain>{xen:phrase tinhte_xentag_tags_first_few_explain}</xen:explain> </xen:spinboxunit>
<xen:include template="wf_widget_options_threads"> <xen:set var="$hideThreadsFilter">1</xen:set> </xen:include>

<xen:spinboxunit label="{xen:phrase option_Tinhte_XenTag_trendingDays}:" explain="{xen:phrase option_Tinhte_XenTag_trendingDays_explain}" name="{$namePrefix}days" value="{xen:if '!empty({$options.days})', $options.days, $xenOptions.Tinhte_XenTag_trendingDays}" min="1" step="7" />
<xen:spinboxunit label="{xen:phrase option_Tinhte_XenTag_trendingDaysCreated}:" name="{$namePrefix}days_created" value="{xen:if '!empty({$options.days_created})', $options.days_created, $xenOptions.Tinhte_XenTag_trendingDaysCreated}" step="7" />
<xen:spinboxunit label="{xen:phrase wf_limit}:" name="{$namePrefix}limit" value="{xen:if '!empty({$options.limit})', $options.limit, $xenOptions.Tinhte_XenTag_trendingMax}" min="1" step="5"> <xen:explain>{xen:phrase wf_limit_explain, "items={xen:phrase tinhte_xentag_tags_lowercase}"}</xen:explain> </xen:spinboxunit>

<xen:selectunit label="{xen:phrase forums}:" name="{$namePrefix}forums" value="" size="5" multiple="true" inputclass="textCtrl"> <xen:options source="$forums" /> </xen:selectunit>
<xen:include template="tinhte_xentag_widget_trending_options" />

modification.description: Insert tag edit fields for forum.
Insert tag edit fields for page.
Insert our criteria for thread search.
Insert staff field in tag edit form.
modification.replace:
$0
<xen:option name="tinhte_xentag_staff" value="1" selected="{$tag.tinhte_xentag_staff}" label="{xen:phrase tinhte_xentag_staff}" hint="{xen:phrase tinhte_xentag_staff_explain}" />

modification.description: Insert our fields in tag edit form.
modification.replace:
<xen:textboxunit name="tinhte_xentag_title" value="{$tag.tinhte_xentag_title}" label="{xen:phrase title}:" placeholder="{$tag.tag}" maxlength="255" />
<xen:textboxunit name="tinhte_xentag_description" value="{$tag.tinhte_xentag_description}" label="{xen:phrase description}:" rows="3" inputclass="Elastic" />
<xen:textboxunit name="tinhte_xentag_url" value="{$tag.tinhte_xentag_url}" label="{xen:phrase tinhte_xentag_url}:" explain="{xen:phrase tinhte_xentag_url_explain}" />
$0

modification.description: Insert our action for batch thread update.

template.title: tinhte_xentag_watch_tag_post
template.subject:
<xen:if is="{$contentData.position} == 0">
{xen:phrase tinhte_xentag_new_tagged_thread_x, "title={$contentData.titleCensored}"}
<xen:else />
{xen:phrase tinhte_xentag_new_tagged_reply_in_thread_x, "title={$contentData.titleCensored}"}
</xen:if>
template.body_html:
{$receiver.username}, {xen:phrase tinhte_xentag_x_tagged_thread_y, 'name={$contentData.username}', 'title={xen:helper threadPrefix, $contentData, plain}{$contentData.title}'} {xen:phrase tinhte_xentag_x_tagged_reply_thread_y, 'name={$contentData.username}', 'title={xen:helper threadPrefix, $contentData, plain}{$contentData.title}'}

 
{xen:raw $contentData.messageHtml}
{xen:phrase view_this_thread} {xen:phrase tinhte_xentag_watched_tags}

{xen:phrase tinhte_xentag_watch_tag_email_footer_1, 'tag_text={$tagText}', 'board_title={$xenOptions.boardTitle}'}

{xen:phrase tinhte_xentag_watch_tag_email_footer_2_html, 'disable_this_link={xen:link canonical:watched/via-email, '', 'u={$receiver.user_id}', 'c={$receiver.email_confirm_key}', 'a=no_email', 't=tag', 'id={$tagId}'}', 'disable_all_link={xen:link canonical:watched/via-email, '', 'u={$receiver.user_id}', 'c={$receiver.email_confirm_key}', 'a=no_email'}', 'link_style=color: #969696', 'board_link={xen:link 'canonical:index'}', 'board_title={$xenOptions.boardTitle}'}

template.title: tinhte_xentag_watch_tag_resource_update
template.subject: {xen:phrase tinhte_xentag_new_tagged_resource_x, "title={$contentData.titleCensored}"}
template.body_html:
{$receiver.username}, {xen:phrase tinhte_xentag_x_tagged_resource_y, 'name={$contentData.username}', 'title={xen:helper resourcePrefix, $contentData, plain}{$contentData.title}'}

 
{xen:raw $contentData.messageHtml}
{xen:phrase view_this_resource} {xen:phrase tinhte_xentag_watched_tags}

{xen:phrase tinhte_xentag_watch_tag_email_footer_1, 'tag_text={$tagText}', 'board_title={$xenOptions.boardTitle}'}

{xen:phrase tinhte_xentag_watch_tag_email_footer_2_html, 'disable_this_link={xen:link canonical:watched/via-email, '', 'u={$receiver.user_id}', 'c={$receiver.email_confirm_key}', 'a=no_email', 't=tag', 'id={$tagId}'}', 'disable_all_link={xen:link canonical:watched/via-email, '', 'u={$receiver.user_id}', 'c={$receiver.email_confirm_key}', 'a=no_email'}', 'link_style=color: #969696', 'board_link={xen:link 'canonical:index'}', 'board_title={$xenOptions.boardTitle}'}

phrases.phrase: Enter the maximum number of tags should be used when the linking is set to use all tags. To remove limitation (use all tags) enter 0 (zero) for this option. It's not recommended to use all tags since it may take a long time to process.
Enable this option to automatically convert post contents to hyperlink to tags where possible.
Enable this option to create link for each tag only once in a piece of content.
Enable this option to automatically convert resource update contents to hyperlink to tags where possible.
Enable this option to use a default description for tags that do not have one set. As of XenForo 1.5.4, XenForo does not render anything.
Enable this option to include thread tags while indexing first post message.

Enable this option to suggest tags for auto completion with in-word match. By default, XenForo only suggest matching starting from the beginning. Please note that this feature may impact server performance, especially with large database of tags.
Enable this option to maintain tag order as entered in the list. By default, XenForo discards this ordering and shows them in alphabetical order.
Enable this option to keep track of views of tag page. As of XenForo 1.5.4, XenForo does not log this information.
Keep Moderator Log for Tag Edit
Enable this option to insert moderator log entry when thread tags are edited. As of XenForo 1.5.3, XenForo does not log this action.
Enter the display order to prioritize forums in tagged content listing. The higher the value, the higher forums will showup in the list. Enter 0 to disable this feature.
Enter the display order to prioritize pages in tagged content listing. The higher the value, the higher pages will showup in the list. Enter 0 to disable this feature.
Enter the display order to prioritize resources in tagged content listing. The higher the value, the higher forums will showup in the list. Enter 0 to disable this feature.
Enable this option to generate rss feed for tags. As of XenForo 1.5.4, XenForo does not support this feature.
Enable this option to display thread tags below its first post.
Enter number of threads to suggest when user opens a thread without viewing permissions. Enter 0 to disable this feature.
Only content created within specified number of days will be taken into account when Trending is calculated.
Only content tagged within specified number of days will be taken into account when Trending is calculated.
Enter how often (in days) the trending tags should be recalculated.
Enable this option to allow user to use #hashtag in posts.
Enable this option to show a small icon for the tag link. The icon must be placed in the image path defined by the style. To be exact: @imagePath/Tinhte/XenTag/tag.png.
Enable this option to show preview when user hover a tag link.
These are all contents from {board_title} tagged {tag_text}.
{tag} (only staff members can use this tag)
Auto tag the first post with thread tags only
Making a tag staff only prevents it from being used by unauthorized users. User must be a member of a user group with "Use staff-only tags" permission.
Enter the number of tags of the current page to be considered when finding related contents. Enter 0 to use all tags (best to use with search engine).
This is a list of all the tags that you are watching.
This is the message they posted
This is the resource they posted
Sorry, your requested thread is currently not available. The following threads may be relevant to what you are looking for:
To view this resource, click here
To view this thread, click here
You must not use these tags: {tags}
If provided, user will be redirected to the specified address upon visiting the tag view page.
Use search engine for better results with big number of tags (see below) or turn it off and use only a couple of tags.
This message was sent to you because you opted to watch the tag "{tag_text}" at {board_title} with email notification of new contents.
If you no longer wish to receive these emails, you may disable emails from this tag or disable all emails.
{name} tagged a reply to the thread {title} with a tag you are watching.
{name} tagged the resource {title} with a tag you are watching.
{name} tagged a thread called {title} with a tag you are watching.
You are not watching any tags.
Are you sure you want to update your email notification settings for all tags?
Are you sure you want to update your email notification settings for one tag?

property.title: Show Icon in Tag Link
property.description: Enable this option to show a small icon for the tag link. The icon must be placed in the image path defined by the style. To be exact: @imagePath/Tinhte/XenTag/tag.png.

property.title: Show Preview
property.description: Enable this option to show preview when user hover a tag link.

templates.template: {xen:phrase tinhte_xentag_x_tagged_thread_y, 'name={xen:helper username, $user, 'subject'}', 'title={xen:helper threadPrefix, $content}{$content.title}'} {xen:phrase tinhte_xentag_x_tagged_reply_thread_y, 'name={xen:helper username, $user, 'subject'}', 'title={xen:helper threadPrefix, $content}{$content.title}'}
#{$displayText}
{xen:link tags, $tag}{xen:link tags, '', 't={$tagText}'} {$displayText}

Please do not remove this copyright notice. Thank you.
XenTag by Tinhte.vn

<xen:if is="{$xenOptions.enableTagging} && {$forum.Tinhte_XenTag_tagsList}"> <xen:include template="helper_tag_list"> <xen:map from="$forum.Tinhte_XenTag_tagsList" to="$tags" /> </xen:include> </xen:if>
• {xen:phrase tinhte_xentag_watched_tags}
<xen:if is="{$xenOptions.enableTagging} && {$Tinhte_XenTag_tagsList}"> <xen:include template="helper_tag_list"> <xen:map from="$Tinhte_XenTag_tagsList" to="$tags" /> </xen:include> </xen:if>
<xen:if is="{xen:property tinhte_xentag_showPreview}"> <xen:require js="js/Tinhte/XenTag/preview.min.js" /> <xen:include template="preview_tooltip" /> </xen:if>

• {xen:phrase forum}

    {xen:helper highlight, $forum.title, $search.search_query, 'highlight'}

    {xen:helper snippet, $forum.description, 150, {xen:array 'term={$search.search_query}', 'emClass=highlight', 'stripHtml=1'}}

modification.replace:
<xen:if is="{$xenOptions.Tinhte_XenTag_tagsBelowFirstPost}"> <xen:if is="{$post.post_id} == {$thread.first_post_id}"> <xen:include template="helper_tag_list"> <xen:map from="$thread.tagsList" to="$tags" /> <xen:set var="$editUrl">{xen:if $canEditTags, {xen:link threads/tags, $thread}}</xen:set> </xen:include> </xen:if> </xen:if>
$0

<xen:if hascontent="true"> <xen:contentcheck> <xen:include template="tinhte_xentag_tag_view_tabs"> <xen:set var="$taggedContents"> $2 </xen:set> </xen:include> </xen:contentcheck> <div><xen:comment>This is for the div.searchResults closing tag that we removed its opening tag</xen:comment> <xen:else /> $0 </xen:if>
Find the whole .pageNavLinkGroup div because there are two of them on the page
